original_text: This is a list of the materials that the workers used to make the tabernacle with the Covenant Box inside it. Moses commanded the Levites to write this list. Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest, was the leader of this work.
korean_text: 성막 곧 증거막을 위하여 레위 사람이 쓴 재료의 물목은 제사장 아론의 아들 이다말이 모세의 명령대로 계산하였으며

sentences.original_text: This is a list of the materials
that the workers used to make the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 일꾼들이 성막을 만드는 데 사용한 것들

sentences.original_text: with the Covenant Box inside it
Ithamar, the son of Aaron the priest
was the leader of this work
